__e: And under all that anger and mistrust and cruelty, there was a goodness in him.
To want, to possess the fear of losing what you think is yours that is what leads to mistrust and hate.
Mrs Eaton, it's obvious that you distrust me. And after what your friends have told you about me, I'm not surprised in the least.
Well, maybe Victor did something to deserve her lack of trust.
There's been too much suspicion... too many lies, on both sides.
And from distrust to hatred... there is only one step.
